arguments.template: View in google map

<audio [src]="source" 
        (keyup)="keyup($event)"
        (play)="change($event)"
        (ended)="change($event)"
        (pause)="change($event)"
        (seeked)="change($event)"
        (error)="change($event)"
        controls="true">Your browser does not support the audio element.</audio>

Pick a date
{{ currentDate | date:'MMMM' }}
{{ currentDate | date: 'yyyy' }}
{{ name }}
{{ day.date.getDate() }}
{{ day.date.getDate() }}
{{formatDate()}}

<select tabindex="0" 
      [multiple]="multiselect ? true:null" 
      (click)="click($event)" 
      (change)="change($event)">
        <option *ngFor="let x of options" 
          [selected]="source === x ? true : null"  
          [value]="x" 
          [textContent]="x"></option>
    </select>
share

<video tabindex="0"
        (focus)="updateControls($event)"
        (mouseenter)="updateControls($event)"
        (mouseleave)="resetControls($event)"
        (keyup)="keyup($event)"
        (play)="change($event)"
        (ended)="change($event)"
        (pause)="change($event)"
        (seeked)="change($event)"
        (error)="change($event)"
        (fullscreenchange)="change($event)"
        [src]="source" 
        [style.width]="width" 
        [style.height]="height"
        [title]="alt"></video>
